main();
}
    }
        process.exit(1);
        console.error("Failed:",err);
    catch(err){
    }
        console.log("The Address of the lockBridge is", await lockBridge.getAddress());
        await lockBridge.waitForDeployment();
        const lockBridge= await LockBridge.deploy();
